content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The reason we did not agree on a final price was that we were unable to meet each other's price expectations. The landlord was looking for a higher price given the location and condition of the apartment, and I was offering a lower price due to the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: Understood. On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 7?
name: Evaluator

content: I rated the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 7 because they were polite, respectful, and straightforward. They were also willing to negotiate, which is a positive aspect of a negotiation. However, the rating could be lower because the negotiation was not as smooth as it could be due to the price difference.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
